name: Squats
description: Squats are a compound exercise that work multiple muscle groups, including the quadriceps, glutes, hamstrings, lower back, and abs.

name: Bench Press
description: The bench press is a weightlifting exercise that primarily targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Deadlifts
description: Deadlifts are a compound exercise that work multiple muscle groups, including the lower back, glutes, hamstrings, quadriceps, and forearms.

name: Push-ups
description: Push-ups are a bodyweight exercise that work the chest, shoulders, triceps, and abs.

name: Pull-ups
description: Pull-ups are a compound exercise that work multiple muscle groups, including the back, shoulders, biceps, and forearms.

name: Military Press
description: The military press, also known as the overhead press, is a weightlifting exercise that targets the shoulders and triceps.

name: Lunges
description: Lunges are a lower body exercise that work the quadriceps, glutes, and hamstrings.

name: Dumbbell Flys
description: Dumbbell flys are an isolation exercise that work the chest and shoulders.

name: Plank
description: The plank is a bodyweight exercise that targets the core muscles, including the abs, lower back, and glutes.

name: Leg Press
description: The leg press is a weightlifting exercise that primarily targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

name: Chin-ups
description: Chin-ups are a compound exercise that work multiple muscle groups, including the back, biceps, and forearms.

name: Bicep Curls
description: Bicep curls are an isolation exercise that work the biceps.

name: Tricep Dips
description: Tricep dips are a bodyweight exercise that work the triceps.

name: Calf Raises
description: Calf raises are an isolation exercise that work the calf muscles.

name: Crunches
description: Crunches are a bodyweight exercise that work the abs.

name: Russian Twists
description: Russian twists are a bodyweight exercise that work the obliques.
